page.title: 10Farming
page.content: A considerable proportion of our D block is given over to farming and, from the age of many of the farm houses and buildings, this has been so for a long time.Today intensive arable farming is the main agricultural land use.There is also a small amount of dairy farming and pig farming is also important. Cereals are the main crop,especially barley and winter wheat.The growing of oats has declined rapidly in recent years.Other main crops include potatoes,carrots,cabbages,Brussels sprouts,cauliflowers and lettuce. Lydiate is well known for strawberry farms that also grow other soft fruit. With so many crops rotation programmes are flexible but the usual process is to grow potatoes once every 7_8 years and not to have more than 3 cereal crops on the run.
